desc: A Father's Commitment fundraiser for Sts. Peter and Paul school allocated bourbon and bourbon raffle. Support SPPS by buying your raffle ticket for the allocated bourbon and bourbon raffle in Doylestown, Ohio. Click here to buy your raffle ticket or event night ticket.

layout.text: A Father’s Commitment is an organization exclusively dedicated to charitable work in support of Sts. Peter and Paul Catholic School. We will provide financial assistance to the school, founded in 1862, that has ensured strong faith foundation in our local and surrounding communities for 160 years. Through our charitable work, we wish to enable the school’s mission of empowering students to strive for academic excellence and to live a life of grace inspired by the Gospel. We believe that through our hard work, commitment, and dedication to our cause, we will make a meaningful financial impact to help build a strong faith foundation, quality education and a lifetime of leadership skills for each student at Sts. Peter and Paul School.
